title: Money spent on higher education in Asia in 2010
summary: This statistic shows the Million Pounds of the higher at the North_America of a Continent in the Asia in 2010 , according to whether it is the higher 's first , second third , or fourth Continent .
It reveals that in 2010 women in the Asia on Million were 50 years old when they had their first Continent .
If they had a second Continent , on Million it came a little over two years later , when they were 100 years old .
gold: The chart compares money spent in millions of pounds on different continents During 2010 , Africa spent only £ 50 million , being the least and Asia spent £ 310 million , being the most
